name: Space Fighter (itch) (GreasyRooster1)
description:
Welcome to Space Fighter! The 8-bit game about shooting the enemies to progress through the game! the farther you go the harder it will get. you will run into snipers, fast shooters and more! there are 10 waves of enemies to defeat before you win!

This game was made for the raspberry pi so it may not work on all devices. for other devices you will need python 3 and pygame for the program to be run.

to run on the pi you will need to go to the game in the terminal and type

python SpaceFighter_Code.py
